title: MBMBaM 593: Foolish and Vacuous Perfume Oil
description:
We’re very excited about our new sponsor, Buzzer Boys, because there are just so many hornets. So many. We don’t know where they came from, but there sure are a lot of them.

Suggested talking points: BradCo, IKEA Burial, Boss Cat Business Bag, Deliciously Kissable Bellybutton Love Potion Fragrance, That’s Why I Bring Cats in on Company Time

Center for Reproductive Rights: https://reproductiverights.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElreoy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
